query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ai_recommendations` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `artistProfileId` INT NOT NULL,
  `type` ENUM('release_timing', 'marketing_strategy', 'pricing', 'collaboration', 'content', 'career_move', 'other') NOT NULL,
  `title` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `reasoning` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `confidenceScore` INT NOT NULL,
  `dataSources` JSON NOT NULL,
  `status` ENUM('pending', 'accepted', 'overridden', 'dismissed') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  `artistResponse` TEXT,
  `respondedAt` TIMESTAMP NULL,
  `priority` INT DEFAULT 5 NOT NULL,
  `expiresAt` TIMESTAMP NULL,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (`artistProfileId`) REFERENCES `artist_profiles`(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `artist_values` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `artistProfileId` INT NOT NULL,
  `mission` TEXT,
  `nonNegotiables` JSON,
  `explicitContentAllowed` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  `politicalContentAllowed` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  `brandDealsAllowed` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  `brandDealCategories` JSON,
  `collaborationOpenness` ENUM('closed', 'selective', 'open') DEFAULT 'selective',
  `preferredGenres` JSON,
  `aiAutomationLevel` ENUM('manual', 'assisted', 'automated') DEFAULT 'assisted',
  `requireApprovalFor` JSON,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (`artistProfileId`) REFERENCES `artist_profiles`(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `communities` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  `slug` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `description` TEXT,
  `imageUrl` TEXT,
  `type` ENUM('genre', 'location', 'career_phase', 'interest', 'private') NOT NULL,
  `visibility` ENUM('public', 'private', 'invite_only') DEFAULT 'public' NOT NULL,
  `createdBy` INT NOT NULL,
  `moderators` JSON,
  `memberCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `postCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `allowPosts` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  `requireApproval` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (`createdBy`) REFERENCES `artist_profiles`(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `forum_posts` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `communityId` INT NOT NULL,
  `authorId` INT NOT NULL,
  `title` VARCHAR(255),
  `content` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `type` ENUM('discussion', 'question', 'resource', 'announcement') DEFAULT 'discussion' NOT NULL,
  `likeCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `replyCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `viewCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `isPinned` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  `isLocked` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  `isDeleted` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  `parentPostId` INT NULL,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (`communityId`) REFERENCES `communities`(`id`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`authorId`) REFERENCES `artist_profiles`(`id`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`parentPostId`) REFERENCES `forum_posts`(`id`)
);

  `postCount` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `allowPosts` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  `requireApproval` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,

  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,

  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,

  FOREIGN KEY (`parentPostId`) REFERENCES `forum_posts`(`id`)
